Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 05 December 2024.
Several spells of showers will occur in Northern and Eastern provinces.

S
howers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Western, Sabaragamuwa and Southern provinces
and in Nuwara-Eliya, Kandy, Galle and Matara districts during the evening or night.

ainly fair weather will prevail elsewhere.

isty conditions can be expected in most places of the island during the morning.
